item.description:
Join us for a fun and relaxing evening! Pinz Bowling in Milford, MA offers half price bowling on Tuesday evenings ($2.75 per game or $12.47 per hour). Waitress service is available at each bowling lane, so we can order food/drinks from the menu. We can not reserve a lane in advance, so please arrive on time. If there is a wait, we can hang out at the bar. Pinz also offers arcade games and laser tag!

Look forward to seeing you for a fun evening! If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near bowling counter or bowling lanes.
item.name: 1/2 Price Bowling, Drinks, Dinner and Fun at Pinz in Milford
